name: Rattleback Troll
description: A large giant creature with a constant droning noise from its shell plates, embodying chaos and savagery.
memorable: Its abilities to debilitate spellcasters and its regenerative traits make it a tough opponent.
goals: To engage and overpower opponents using brute strength and poison.
relations: May be found in the company of other chaotic beings or monstrous creatures.
environment: Commonly found in dark or shadowy areas, exploiting its advantages in dim light.
strengths: Impressive physical attributes with high strength, constitution, and dexterity; possesses poison immunity.
weaknesses: Very low intelligence and charisma, making it poor at tactical maneuvers or engaging with others.
attacks: Employs a multiattack that includes a bite and two claw strikes, using poison to debilitate foes.
most_powerful_ability: Venom Spray creates a 30-foot cone that deals significant poison damage and incapacitates targets from regaining hit points.
senses: Has darkvision and advantage on perception checks in dim light or darkness, enhancing its effectiveness in stealthy environments.
skills: Possesses average perception skill, indicating limited awareness compared to other creatures.
additional_information: Regenerates 10 hit points each turn unless hit by fire damage.
Distracting Rattle hinders spellcasters within close proximity.
Advantage on attacks during dim light or darkness due to Night Hunters trait.
Poison from both bite and venom spray prevents targets from regaining hit points for a minute.
Can be a formidable foe for low to mid-level adventurers.

troll that hinders spellcasters with its rattle
